title: Karan Johar Pens Down A Heartfelt Birthday Note For His 'Strongest Support System' Gauri Khan
text:
Some friendships in Bollywood have passed every test of time and have been rock solid throughout. As celebrity interior designer and superstar Shah Rukh Khan's wife Gauri Khan turned 49 on Tuesday, her close friend Karan Johar penned a heart warming post and called her his "silent support system in life".

Karan on Tuesday took to Instagram, where he shared a photograph of Gauri and captioned it,

"Happy birthday to the strongest silent support system in my life...the most real person I know... Beautiful within and beautiful always and one must never be fooled with her blank stare because she is ridiculously on point with her observations!"

In his note, he further added,

"She makes me laugh with her manual of how to live a stress free life (she knows what I am talking about) also am so proud with how she has created a solid professional zone for herself and is super successfully running a design enterprise...I love you so much Gauri! You don''t realise how much of a force you are in all our lives... Shine on! Happy birthday."

Gauri married Shah Rukh in 1991, after a six-year courtship.

They have a son named Aryan and a daughter Suhana. In 2013 they became parents to a third child, a son, named AbRam, who was born via surrogacy.
